articles.title: Meta Ray-Ban Display Is Now On Sale, But Only In Select US Stores - UploadVR
articles.description: Meta Ray-Ban Display is now being sold in select physical US stores, though for most stores you'll need to secure a demo to purchase.

articles.title: Amazon event 2025 live: Reactions to Echo Dot, Kindle Scribe Colorsoft, Fire TV, more - ZDNET
articles.description: Ahead of Prime Day, the commerce giant has unleashed a barrage of smart home gadgets and devices, including sequels to the Echo Dot, Kindle Scribe, Ring, and more.

articles.title: Amazon France shipped someone their ROG Xbox Ally X almost 3 weeks early… and they’ve already reviewed it - Windows Central
articles.description: Amazon didn't get the memo about the October 16 release date

articles.title: Galaxy Ring swelling victim shows aftermath and points to another case - Android Authority
articles.description: The Galaxy Ring owner shared a photo of his injury while highlighting another online swelling report. Samsung is investigating.

articles.title: YouTuber unboxes what seems to be a pre-release version of an M5 iPad Pro - Ars Technica
articles.description: Signs point to a relatively mild upgrade from the 16-month-old Apple M4.

articles.title: Official Final Fantasy Tactics Apparel Is Available At Amazon - GameSpot
articles.description: Celebrate the return of a cult-classic Final Fantasy game with some stylish clothing.
